resources.string:
"
Powered By: 
Imgur Imgur is the Internets visual storytelling community. Millions of people visit Imgur every day to explore, share and discuss the best visual stories the Internet has to offer.
 
Glide An image loading and caching library for Android focused on smooth scrolling
 
Floating Action Button by chalup
 
Material by rey5137
 
Ion by Koush
 
Nanotasks by fabiendevos
 
Google-gson
 
TextDrawable by amulyakhare
 
“IMGUR” is a trademark of Imgur LLC and is used here for informational purposes only. "Imgur Workout" is not affiliated with Imgur and has not been reviewed or approved by Imgur LLC.

 Please send any feedback/feature request/bug report to JohnnyJemDeveloper@gmail.com! 

Please consult your physician before attempting any workout routines. Software is provided as-is and in no event shall the author be liable for any special, direct, indirect, or consequential damages or any damages whatsoever resulting from injury, loss of use, data or profits, whether in action of contract, negligence or other tortious action, arising out or in connection with the use or performance of this software."

"
This app was made by Johnny Molina.

Thanks to:
